metadata.name: Burning desire
metadata.description: While Santa Claus has long been known as the jolly, kind-hearted figure of Christmas cheer, this artistic photography project takes a darker turn. In this twisted portrayal, Santa has gone off the rails, his once beloved reindeer now becoming victims of his own bloodlust. His home, once a cheerful and cozy abode, has become a cluttered, filthy nest of chaos, reflecting the disarray of his own mind. No longer spreading joy and goodwill, this Santa is now a symbol of societal decay, reflecting the dark underbelly of modern life. Through striking visuals and powerful imagery, this project challenges our notions of what it means to be merry and bright, and asks us to confront the darker aspects of our collective consciousness.
